name: fluid-diff
description: A library for describing the differences between two JSON structures.

scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.test:browser: node node_modules/testem/testem.js --file tests/testem.js ci --skip Safari,PhantomJS --launch Chrome
scripts.posttest: node node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js report -r text-summary -r html --report-dir reports --temp-directory coverage

author: Tony Atkins <tony@raisingthefloor.org>
